sentences.en: 'Monseigneur , I am flattered to devote myself to your orders.'
sentences.cn: “ 大人, 能为您效劳我深感荣幸. ”

sentences.en: After he graduated he continued to devote himself to research.
sentences.cn: 毕业之后他继续致力于研究工作.

sentences.en: After her marriage, she couldn't devote herself totally to her music.
sentences.cn: 她结婚之后无法全力倾注于音乐.

sentences.en: Caroline began to devote more care to her work.
sentences.cn: 凯洛琳开始更加努力地工作了.

sentences.en: Considerable resources have been devoted to proving him a liar.
sentences.cn: 大量的资源已被用来证明他是个撒谎者。

sentences.en: He decided to devote the rest of his life to scientific investigation.
sentences.cn: 他决定将自己的余生献给科学研究事业。

sentences.en: He devoted a major section of his massive report to an analysis of U.S. aircraft design.
sentences.cn: 他在那份厚重的报告中用一个主要章节分析了美国的飞机设计。

sentences.en: He is determined to devote his life to science.
sentences.cn: 他决心把毕生精力贡献给科学事业.

sentences.en: He wanted to be a physicist and devote himself to research.
sentences.cn: 他立志要成为一名物理学家,并献身于科学研究.

sentences.en: I devote myself to helping the poor.
I will devote all my life to the cause of education.
sentences.cn: 我愿把毕生献给教育事业.

sentences.en: She forsook her worldly possessions to devote herself to the church.
sentences.cn: 她抛弃世上的财物而献身教会.

sentences.en: She had started to devote her energies to teaching rather than performing.
sentences.cn: 她已经开始将精力从表演转移到教学中。

sentences.en: This day I should devote to a hasty glimpse of the world, past and present.
sentences.cn: 这一天,我要用来匆忙地扫视这个世界, 它的过去和现在.

sentences.en: We should devote everything we have.
sentences.cn: 我们应该奉献我们的一切.

sentences.en: We should devote ourselves assiduously and faithfully to the duties of our profession.
sentences.cn: 我们应当勤奋地而且忠诚地献身于我们的职责.

sentences.en: You must devote your attention to your work.

words.tran_cn: 虔诚的，祷告的；信仰的；献身的
献身于…；致力于…（devote的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: to use all or most of your time, effort etc in order to do something or help someone
to use all or most of your time, effort etc in order to do something or help someone
